question: Elavenil Valarivan, an Indian player belongs to which game?
explanation:
Indian shooters Manu Bhaker, Elavenil Valarivan, and Divyansh Panwar won gold medals in their respective events in the ISSF World Cup Final on 21 November. India is currently on top of the list with three gold medals, followed by China.
Manu Bhaker clinched gold with a junior world record in the women\'s 10m air pistol event. She shot 244.7 to win the medal in the International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF).Elavenil claimed the top honours in the women\'s 10m air rifle competition at the World Cup final. Elavenil shot a score of 250.8 to clinch the medal. Divyansh finished on top in the men\'s 10 air rifle competition. He secured a final score of 250.1.
